    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Weapon
    Monster.addWeapon(Weapon weapon)
    Gives a monster a weapon to use, if one is already equipped the old weapon will be returned
    Weapon
    Monster.removeWeapon()
    Removes and returns the equipped weapon from the monster.
